definition: A state of mental or emotional strain or tension resulting from demanding circumstances, often associated with feelings of pressure, anxiety, or overwhelm. It is commonly used to describe the negative impact of excessive workloads, challenging situations, or personal difficulties on an individual's well-being.

examples.german: Ich habe viel Stress auf der Arbeit.
examples.english: I have a lot of stress at work.
